LocationUse.name: LocationUse
LocationUse.description: Records the general purpose of the Location.

DeveloperName.description: Name of the developer of the location.

IsBookable.description: Indicates if the location is bookable.

Language.description: Specifies the language in use at the location.

LocationType.description: Specifies the type of the location.

MasterLabel.description: The label that identifies this record throughout the user interface.

Use.description: Specifies what the location is used for.
